title.name: fs
title.description: Provides file system services to the switch.

title.name: ldr (Loader)
title.description: Provides loading services to the switch.

title.name: ncm
title.description: Services for internal file path and content management.

title.name: pm (Process Manager)
title.description: Service that manages all console processes.

title.name: boot
title.description: Low level program that helps initlize the console at boot.

title.name: usb
title.description: Acts as a debugging sysmodule for devlopment kits, in retail consoles this remains unused.

title.name: boot2
title.description: Secondary switch bootloader, this is the first sysmodule launch by pm at boot.

title.name: ldn
title.description: Service that handels all loacl network communication.

title.name: ppc
title.description: PPC Services. This service controls all console clock speeds.

title.name: nvnflinger
title.description: Nvnflinger services. This service is responsibe for mediating the communication between vi and nvservices.

title.name: psc
title.description: PSC services. Provides services related to power state changes in the system.

title.name: am
title.description: Applet Manager services. Provides services for interacting with system applets.

title.name: spl
title.description: SPL services. SPL ("Secure Platform services") is responsible for handling all cryptographic operations within the system and relaying them to the Secure Monitor when necessary.

title.name: pctl
title.description: Parental Control services. PCTL handles all parental controls management.

title.name: eupld
title.description: Error Upload services. The "Error upload" service reads and uploads error reports from erpt:r to a cloud server.

title.name: eclct
title.description: This title is patched by atmosphere by default.

title.name: fatal
title.description: Fatal services. This title is patched by atmosphere by default.

title.name: grc
title.description: GRC services. GRC (Game Recording) uses libstagefright and the NvMMLite TVMR library for writing recorded video to MP4s.

title.name: creport
title.description: This process is launched by NS when PM signals that there is a crashing process. Creport takes a string containing a pid formatted in base10 as input, and generates an error report. This error report can later be sent to the cloud server by Eupld services. This title is patched by atmosphere by default.

title.name: ro
title.description: Services related to the loading of nro files.

title.name: migration
title.description: Migration services. Migration is a sysmodule designed for handling the new Switch to Switch transfer system.

title.name: jpegdec
title.description: Jpegdec services. Jpegdec is a refactored sysmodule for handling all JPEG decoding associated with capture services.

title.name: safemode
title.description: Safemode can be launched by a button combo at boot and has the task of performing any pending system updates.

title.name: olsc
title.description: OLSC services. OLSC (OnLine Savedata Cloud?) is a sysmodule designed for handling the new online savedata cloud backup system.

title.name: qlaunch
title.description: Qlaunch system applet, launched by NS with TID loaded from system-config-title. Responsible for the switches homescreen, setting and news menus.

title.name: playerSelect
title.description: This is the applet presented when launching a game that allows the user to select a user.

title.name: web
title.description: Nintendo Switch does not have a normal Internet Browser for user usage. However, there is multiple browser applets. It is the NetFront NX browser, which is based on Webkit.

title.name: MaintenanceMenu
title.description: Initial applet displayed when booting into Recovery_Mode. This title is launched by NS when a state flag is val1 indicating that this title should be launched instead of the above "SystemAppletMenu" title.
